[ library(graph_algorithms) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

nodename_to_node(+Graph, +NodeName, -Node)

Retrieves the node number given a node name
Graph
a graph structure
NodeName
ground data, usually node name
Node
an integer node number

Description

Fail Conditions

Fails if no node name information is available

See Also

node_to_nodename / 3, nodes_to_nodenames / 3, nodenames_to_nodes / 3
